member.summary: The constructor creates a new instance of .
member.param: Instance of containing ATT API settings.

members.member:
Gets SMS service scope - that is, returns the type of service this object interfaces with. In this case, it is SMS.
SMS service scope. Ignore CodeIt.Right rule for this line. Using ScopeType.SMS.ToString() avoid hardcode scope type.

member.exception: phoneNumbers is null.
phoneNumbers count equals zero.

member.param: Identifier of SMS message to get status for.
member.returns: Instance of with the information about SMS message status.
member.exception: smsId is null.

members.member:
Gets SMS messages received for a specific short code.
Short code to get SMS message for. instance of Returns task as a result of asynchronous operation. Task result is list of inbound SMS messages. shortCode is null. Ignore CodeIt.Right rule for this line. Unused local use for output in the JSON parser.
